website_summaries.verdict: Thin wires make this mattress pad more comfortable than many competitors. But this means they may snap more easily in the wash.
pros: Queen, King and California King offer dual controls and zones
cons: Some report problems with circuit boxes running loudly or overheating
Washing the mattress pad sometimes breaks the thin wires

customer_reviews.title: I have contacted Perfect Fit Industries on numerous occasions
customer_reviews.text: According to the insert that came with my California King pad, there is a limited five-year warranty. After using mine for about eight months one of the controls stopped working. I have contacted Perfect Fit Industries on numerous occasions, via phone and email, and have never received a reply.
customer_reviews.author: Deana R.

customer_reviews.title: MAY BURN YOUR HOUSE DOWN!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE!!! This product may BURN your house down!!! We returned from a trip to find a small hole smoldered through 4 layers of sheets and blankets. One more blanket and it would have reached oxygen and burned our house down. We believe our cleaner stepped on the controller turning it on and then it automatically turned off saving the house, but much too close for comfort. In different conditions this would have flashed. Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Fire Hazard!!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!!!!! I have had this mattress pad for a couple of years with no issues. It started to turn off after it was turned on, so I decided to replace it with a new mattress pad. When I removed the bedding from the bed, I found a burned plug!!! Thank GOD it did not catch fire as this is right by my head!! Just wanted to make other buyers aware of what can happen with this mattress pad. Other than the danger it brought, it was an otherwise nice mattress pad!
customer_reviews.author: ScoobyDawg

customer_reviews.title: Burned out and nearly caught the blanket on fire
customer_reviews.text: WE LOVED this mattress pad so much that even after it nearly caught the house on fire I still wanted to buy another one. The blanket stopped working one day and I looked at the controller on my side of the bed and the cords were black and fizzled into the mattress pad. I unplugged it and threw it away but miss it so much! I guess we should count ourselves lucky nothing worse happened!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Mandlman

customer_reviews.title: Wires were too short to assemble properly for Cal-king.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking mattress pad and controls but the wires connecting everything were much too short. There was simply no way to make these pieces functional on a king-sized bed. They say if there's a problem to call the company directly. We did that over a 6 hour period and always got the same recording to leave our number and they'd call us back. We did, and they didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy A.

customer_reviews.title: Newer pad doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: I have had the twin size which works as stated. The full sized one has never heated up well,like only half of it works and at a low level. If I turn it on hours ahead, it is warm enough. I didn't put this on my bed until it was too late to return. Which was stupid on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Lenabug

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: Annoyed. It would be helpful if the pictures matched the instructions. After putting the pad on the bed, the label out at the top, and making the bed, I find that the label and connectors should be at the bottom of the bed. So why are the pictures showing the label at the top next to the wall and outlets? Dumb. Who proofed this?
customer_reviews.author: Rynnie

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointing Item
customer_reviews.text: The perfect fit mattress pad stopped working after only 5 weeks. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: MBS

customer_reviews.title: Two (2) months to the day after ordering (I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Two (2) months to the day after ordering (I ordered a quantity of 2), of the heating mattress covers stopped working. You turn it on, it immediately goes off. I seem to be having trouble with the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Emily A

customer_reviews.title: I was very much looking forward to an electric mattress ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very much looking forward to an electric mattress pad that was safe. Two issues. On high it almost is warm enough. The heat does not go all the way down to the feet. This I found strange as the feet really get cold. . I had to pull the pad way down on the bed to get any heat in the foot area, leaving nothing under the pillow at all. Of course you don't need any heat under the pillow, but you do need it under your back. I think they need to readjust this heating pad
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but durability is an issue
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a previous review saying that we had just purchased this pad and that it had broken within 1 month of use. I want to amend that. I went back and unplugged and replugged the electrical source to the mattress pad and since then, for a week, the pad has been working reliably. So, I would suggest if you are having trouble, ensure your electrical connection is firmly in place. We've purchased this brand of heated mattress pads several times in the past, and the pads help us reduce heating costs in our house with high ceilings. The mattress pads are very comfortable, but they usually last about 2 years maximum, which is acceptable but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not up to full heat.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I have purchased. The first one lasted about a year and a half and one side quit working. This one only heats about half of the bed on one side. I like to preheat the bed before getting in and only the center is warm. The head and feet areas are cold. Still feels good just not what I know the warmer is capable of.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Product defective and key parts not included in shipment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered King size pad which should have two controllers, but only one controller was included in the box. The controller that I did receive did not work--the display light flashed for a few seconds and then went out and the mattress pad did not get warm. The manufacturer's customer service number is not staffed, and callers must leave a call back message.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Became a great disappointment, after giving it a great review.
customer_reviews.text: This was my review until the control system failed after less than a year of great work. Buying a new one from another company. My 94 year old mother raves about it, to anyone who will listen (others are getting one). She has seen such a difference from her aches and pains. It has made a major improvement in her sleep. She just wishes that she had known about it sooner. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: drdalebhi

customer_reviews.title: NO WARRANTY - COMPANY MAY BE OUT OF BUSINESS
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product in various sizes for many years. It works wonderfully, and the company always honored their 5 year warranty, until now. We need a warranty replacement on one of our warmers. I attempted to contact the company for two months via email, and phone messages. There was no response. Now their phone system is no longer taking messages, and their website is down. This is too high a price to pay for a product that there is no way to redeem the warranty. Very sad. This really was a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: P. H.

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong after 16+ months! Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm personally a warm sleeper, so this would literally give me heat stroke, but my parents are really cold sleepers and wanted a heated mattress pad for forever. I've been hesitant to write a review for this product until they've had adequate time to use it... We bought this in December 2014 and it's now April 2016. My parents still use it frequently and they're quite happy with it. They don't get too hot, so it's not going to burn you up every night. It just provides a nice gentle warmth. They even bought one for their guest bed!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: best mattress heaing pad
customer_reviews.text: This is my second 1 I have bought. Still have the queen and plan to put this on a full bed. I love that it heats different zones. If my feet are cold then I cant sleep. This heated mattress pad takes care of my cold feet. Also the controls are at the top of the pad, so u don't have to run the wires under the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: electric mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one for me. My first one was 7yrs old and I used it every night except during the middle of summer. The control switch stopped working so I replaced it with the same model. So far it's as good as the old one.
customer_reviews.author: A.O. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Not completely pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one a few years ago in queen size & it's been wonderful. This one doesn't seem to work nearly as well. It isn't as warm & I can feel the wires. It also doesn't warm the bed in advance of our getting into the bed. Very odd.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret J

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I get cold so easy. Last year I had to use a personal heater and a heating blanket (burned through 3) and still freezing while my fiance burned up. So this year I got this heating mattress pad and the mink heating blanket from softheat. Best purchase ever! He doesn't have his side plugged in. I keep the pad on my side on hi for deep soothing heat on my back and the blanket on 4. Even the dogs love it! But don't try to pull the blanket from under them it will rip the stitching to the inside pad. Learned the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Cords Too Short
customer_reviews.text: Everything was nice about this blanket - EXCEPT the cords with the controllers were too short. They would not reach the headboard of the bed, nor would they reach bedside tables. Hard to make adjustments during the night when you have to reach down on the floor to locate the controller(s). Cords need to be a couple of feet longer. Returned the blanket, and bought another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife almost 4 years ago not for Christmas and its still amazing to this day. Every time we get into bed she says this is the was the best gift ever! I only wish we could set it up on a schedule or remotely turn it on!
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Soft Heat Dobby Stripe 233 Thread-Count...
customer_reviews.text: Here it is... we have not heard a whine or other sound from this mattress pad. My wife loves this as she can set her side to bake while I use mine to warm up my side and then kill it.... except on the exceptionally code nights that get a 1 or 2 from me. So far none of the issues other reviewers have listed are present for us..( I will update this post is this changes) the wires are small and not the noticeable. Bottom line great item and I do recommend this especially if you want to turn down the heat and save a few $$ or you live with a person who is perpetually cold.
customer_reviews.author: DCLW

customer_reviews.title: Good but LOUD!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my mattress pad yesterday and used it last night. I had read the reviews that mentioned the buzzing sound, but figured, "How loud can it be?". Really loud, is the answer. It emits a buzzing sound for about five seconds, then pauses, then five more seconds of buzzing. I turned on some "white noise" to try and mask the sound, but unless I had the volume way up, I could still hear the buzzing. Although I really like the pad, I'm not sure if the noise is something I can get used to, since it is really annoying. I own two other heated pads that are nice and quiet, so this one might be going back.
customer_reviews.author: R. Risley

customer_reviews.title: This heated mattress pad was ok until 1 side died ...
customer_reviews.text: This heated mattress pad was ok until 1 side died after 3 months use... I also noticed the plug connections got really warm, didn't seem right they should get that hot. Amazon won't take it back after 30 days, so now I have to figure out how to get it replaced. I bought a different brand to replace it, hopefully it has a longer life
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This pad is decent and the heat is well distributed. And it gets hot. I keep it on Lo. Any higher and you'll sweat. I live in a warm climate and the winter is short. However, this heated pad would definitely do well in very cold climates.
customer_reviews.author: Raven H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well but for less than 2 years
customer_reviews.text: This would've been a 5 star review for many reasons but... my less than 2 year old Cal King heating pad stopped working on one side 2-3 months ago. Now that it's getting into winter, I really need it and after two attempts to contact the maker for warranty repair or replacement) I have yet to hear from them. If I do get satisfaction, I'll revise this review.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky & Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Works great for those cold nights
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It warms up quickly, and even the Hi setting is a comfortable warmth. I had read comments on other products where the power connector was too high on the mattress pad. This is not the case with this product. The power port is noticeably facing down on the mattress pad. My feet have not come into contact with it, even though my toes do hang over a full size bed a little bit. I rated 4 stars because it does have a little of a plastic feel to it. It's not so noticeable that it hinders sleep, but it does make some noise. Sounds like a thin plastic cover. Does not affect sleeping comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Coolsaya

customer_reviews.title: Can get quite warm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for when our arthritis kicks in and it does a great job. The heat is a nice gentle heat that helps relieve the aches. I have found over time it does get warmer, we started off at the 10 setting and now are at 3-6 so it can get quite warm but not burning. My only complaint is that the full size pad should have 2 controllers for when one person doesn't need the heat as much as the other. I would definitely recommend this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Working
customer_reviews.text: What great the first mo last day could be return that night it died. Amazon did replace it, however for the cost it should of lasted years. I e had one before different name brand had it for 8 yrs & half the price
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Warmer
customer_reviews.text: I am changing my review because I realized the issue was with on my end. I had complained that the warmer would turn off in just a few minutes. I figured out that was because the cord had come unplugged from the warmer. Since I plugged it back in, no issues, go figure lol. I really love this warmer. Im a massage therapist and my clients love it too. you cannot feel the wires when laying on it and the heat is perfect. its not to warm and not splotchy. It warms the whole body.
customer_reviews.author: Shonda A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great until you wash it
customer_reviews.text: We've had our mattress pad for nearly two years. We really like it but after a few washings, one side stopped working. Now the other side has stopped working. I followed the washing instructions as much as possible but my washer doesn't have a pre-soak option. The pad is still in excellent condition but it no longer heats up. The controls are also a loud click and when its the middle of the night, it can wake up a light sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Janna Kinnear

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: After my electric blanket shocked me, I threw it out and bought this electric pad for my bed. It heats up really well. Love it! I use it on level 4. If I use it on level 10 during cold winter weather, it gets very warm to the point where I'm perspiring. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted...
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for our king size bed, and it is one of our best purchases (it has separate dials for the two sides). Sometimes when I work late at night, it is hard to fall asleep when my body / feet are cold. Now, I turn it on Hi for 5-10 min then turn it off, and I can fall asleep right away. It is really nice and comfortable. I am buying it for my kids' bed now. A year later, half of the controllers were dead!
customer_reviews.author: Xiaole Liu

customer_reviews.title: oh I love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much ! so soft to sleep on, no bumpy cords to mark my skin or hurt my tender old thin skin. This Soft Heat Dobby Stripe Heated Mattress Pad is so awesome and I haven't heard any noise at all from the transformer,no peeps or squeeks, nor have I had any problems with the electrical set-up. . I do not.understand the complaints. I think it may be possible those persons could have treated the product incorrectly or the delivery was too rough. This product is wonderful and performs just as the Maker said it would. This product is wonderful and performs just as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Jlerch

customer_reviews.title: Works absolutely fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased this and a new electric blanket because our old (as in really old) electric blanket just wasn't cutting it anymore. I would say that in a fairly temperate climate, you could just get away with this heated matress pad and forget about the electric blanket. The weather here is in the 40s at night right now and our themostat goes down to 60 degress (farenheit) at night and with just this pad on either low or one, we are both toasty warm. It actually seems to work better than our new electric blanket. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: OverHeated

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT GET WARM, PLUG IN SCRATCHES FOOT
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT WHAT I EXPECTED. USING IT FOR WINTER PET BED.
customer_reviews.author: BILL NICOLEN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product !! I'd give it 5 stars but it can't be left in an on state so a remote plug could turn it on or off a few min before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It seems to heat evenly over the entire surface. We still haven't encountered our normal winter cold temperatures, but as for now, the 1 or 2 setting has been sufficient. No radio interference from the transformers as others have experienced, The power cords and transformers, while warm, are not hot enough to cause any kind of hazard. A welcome addition to our Select Comfort California king sized mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Duane

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this for purchase!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it !!!!!! What I liked is that u don't feel the wires! I turn it on about 15 min before getting in bed( on high) n then turn it off. I like that the sheets are warm n stay warm enough until I fall asleep. The only thing I can say I would change is the wires R at the bottom of the bed n my plug is behind the head board. I didn't want the wires underfoot so I just flipped the pad so the wires are at the head of the bed instead. Problem solved !!! I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lj1022

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: One side works, one side dead after 5 minutes. Customer Service never returned my call. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit Heated Mattress Pad is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I now have two PerfectFit Heated Mattress Pads, I bought the first one over a year ago, and just bought a second one for another bed. They give wonderful, comfortable heat on these cold nights! The Amazon ad indicates only one heat control for the Cal King, which didn't make sense. I called the company to make sure it was dual-control, they assured me that there were two controls...and sure enough, it arrived with two controls.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Solid 4 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought ours last September and have been very happy with it. Really only change would be having graduated heat - warmer at the feet than the head. Can’t give it a 5th Star but they earned the 4. Last week it stopped working - control won’t lite/pad won’t heat. Emailed Customer Service and just got an email that they are sending a new one and to dump the old one. And this didn’t happen because of washing as we’d seen the reviews about that and were putting it off.
customer_reviews.author: GarryK.1

customer_reviews.title: Did not put blanket on bed until December of 2017 ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not put blanket on bed until December of 2017, one control did not work, then within 3 weeks the second control stopped working. Looked into returning however the warranty expired November of 2017. In summary the blanket did not work from the time it was pulled out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: The controllers broke after about 3 months of use. I bought it last winter, used it for 3 months, put it away, then put it back on about two weeks ago and one controller was broken (won’t stay on), and the other one just broke today. So $170 for three months of use and now it’s landfill. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: KH1

customer_reviews.title: Makes jumping into bed easy!
customer_reviews.text: After long debating if I need something like this I took the plunge. About an hour before bed I turn it up to 6 to warm up the bed. By the time I get in, the bed is nice and warm. I then turn it down to 3 or 4. This allows me to feel the warmth all evening without being hot. On doing some research about the buzzing issue I found that if you plug directly into the wall, your chances of buzzing goes way down. I am buying one for my guest room and have already bought one as a present.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: As the directions say, you will not specifically feel the heat when you press your hand down on it, but it works really well. I can't feel the wires at all. It heats up quickly and am able to turn it on LOW and keep nice and toasty all night. No noise from the plug at all (I saw in some other reviews there were some issues with that) Love the dual controls, so I can leave my side off when I want to and my husband can turn his side up as much as he wants.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Mom's comfort
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad was a gift for my 92 year old mother who likes a warm bed. I turn it on HI about an hour before bedtime and then down to 5 and leave it on like that all night. The wires are so thin you basically can't feel them. I put mom's nightgown between the sheet and the comforter and it is nice and cozy by the time she goes to bed. I relied on some of the previous good reviews when I purchased this item,and I would recommend it. It was purchased recently so I can't comment on it's longevity.
customer_reviews.author: hunny

customer_reviews.title: it works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It fit the mattress perfect and works very well with good even temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Burrell & Lesta

customer_reviews.title: When it worked I LOVED it. Since they are replacing it I am ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Dec 2013; by Dec 2014, the controls on one side didn't work. Read in the Q/A, it has a 5 year warranty. I called on 10/6/2015 and they are shipping me a brand new one. Just gave them the model # and serial #. When it worked I LOVED it. Since they are replacing it I am giving in 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G.      Essex CT

customer_reviews.title: Died after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this thing at first. And then it died after 4 months of light use. Since it's duel control the other side works but even swapping out the temperature controller, the dead side won't stay on more than a few seconds. So it's either the connector between the controller or the wires in the actual mattress pad. Not exactly a good life span for a product that was used maybe 3 times a week on low (because it can overheat you during the night!).
customer_reviews.author: Shoe-a-holic

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We keep the house at 65'F to save on electricity. The warmer provides more than ample heat to keep you warm until your body adjusts to the bed temperature. I find that most nights I turn it on the low setting, and off after a hour. I really like the fact that it is low voltage too.
customer_reviews.author: dparker

customer_reviews.title: great fit - warmth - but deficient heating control dial...
customer_reviews.text: fits the mattress/bed perfectly as promised and is perfect to heat the bed before getting into it - so comfy. extremely important to have dual control so each side of the bed can be heated at different temperature. however, one of the 2 'heating' control dial stopped working after 1 day! received the replacement mattress yesterday and the new heating control box made in Thailand is twice as big as the previous one made in China. one of the new heating control dial does not seem to work properly out of the box...
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Bezer

customer_reviews.title: Works great until it doesn't...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 3 months, then one of the transformers/temp control units went out. Replacement item on the way. I normally wouldn't be all that worried about it, but after we liked this one so much, we ordered a queen size unit for another bed, and one of its controllers was basically DOA. I'm not too confident of the longevity of either product.
customer_reviews.author: EddieCardsFan

customer_reviews.title: Like this brand very well
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of same make. Replaced one that control on one side quit working after 6 years. I like that where it plugs into mattress pad, it is on front of mattress, not on top where you come in contact with at night. Controls make no sound while it is on at night. Would not buy any other kind.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S

customer_reviews.title: Great bed heater with individual heater settings for either side
customer_reviews.text: Great bed heater with individual heater settings for either side. One of the things I love about this is it's easy-to-read controllers. The setting is backlit in red and easily readable without reading glasses. I had another bed heater that was LCD and was impossible to read the setting.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Jensen

customer_reviews.title: ... had it for 1 year and it has worked great. We did order the king size which was ...
customer_reviews.text: So far we have had it for 1 year and it has worked great. We did order the king size which was to be shipped with 2 controllers. We only received one when the order came in. It took the company almost 6 weeks to get us our second controller. We did order a second unit a few months latter to give has a gift. We did check to make sure the second one had the controller before wrapping it. All was good on the second unit.
customer_reviews.author: Billy80

customer_reviews.title: After two years of use.....Still going strong and excellent
customer_reviews.text: This dual zone heating pad, stopped me and my wife war on it is too cold and too hot. It is great to say, "Turn up your side" if she says she is cold. Previously having been through two other heating pads that didn't last, this unit has been consistently a great pad heater. We are very happy. It have 10 difference heat setting and is easy to use. I have not experience any sound issues, but my house is loud.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: Mother-in-law likes it
customer_reviews.text: Easy for her to adjust and power on/off. Happy that it's keeping her toasty at night!
customer_reviews.author: HappyHeathen

customer_reviews.title: Toasty toes!
customer_reviews.text: So nice in the cold winter months. The temperature dial seems to have a loose connection and
customer_reviews.author: Gina Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: Heard many great things about these mattress pads and decided to try one. It worked great for the first month - then I noticed that the heat did not seem to be even throughout the pad - some hot spots, some with no heat at all (I have the double size). Couldn't find a place to contact seller, so am leaving feedback here, and hopefully they will read it and get in touch. Am a little skeptical about having it on for a long period, so I just use it to warm up the bed, then shut it off ~
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Fits the bed well, heats quickly, quite toasty. Does require a 3 prong outlet or adapter installed. Does not feel warm to the touch, as promised; you've got to lie on it to feel warmth. I've had others before... notice that none of them seem to last more than a few years; don't know how long this one will last. But definitely worth the money in cold weather. Only drawback: way too hard to get up in morning out of toasty warm bed!
customer_reviews.author: J. Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Heater!
customer_reviews.text: The heated mattress pad works perfectly and the controls are very easy. The only issue I've found is that when my husband has his side turned on and my side is off...I am getting residual heat from his side. Not a 'bad' thing - we're saving electricity by not having BOTH sides on, I guess... :) My husband giggles every night when I preheat his side and then he crawls in about 20 minutes later. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: kn50443

customer_reviews.title: Bought this a few months ago and have been using it ever since
customer_reviews.text: This product is fabulous for many reasons, not the least of which is unlike some heated blankets I have purchased in the past it will not leave you feeling like you are in a sauna. The soft heat is divine. My wife has even commented that it has helped with her sore back, knees and feet, especially during the frigid Midwestern winters. Bonus--we have only had to break out the comforter when the temp has dropped below zero. I know some folks have commented on the buzzing of the AC/DC converter, but neither myself nor my wife has noticed this at all. Must be that NIN concert I went to in high school, thanks Trent!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Dudley

customer_reviews.title: No more cold sheets
customer_reviews.text: In the winter time I can’t stand cold sheets. This warms my sheets in minutes. We were given one of these last year and decided to get another set.
customer_reviews.author: charleagh2525

customer_reviews.title: No more Cold Nights
customer_reviews.text: It's a heated mattress that does what it's supposed to keeps me warm. Just wish the dialers for the heat setting was cooler looking. I'm reminded of a hospital setting when I see it on my night stand. Depending on location of outlets you may not be able to hide the cords and the battery pack thingy attached to the cords/plugs. The pad could be a little thicker, but I'm fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Seagal

customer_reviews.title: Does anything last anymore?
customer_reviews.text: It was a good mattress pad, heated up quickly and we couldn't feel the wires. But one side quit working after 2.5 years...so now we need another one. Great.
customer_reviews.author: ShelleyB

customer_reviews.title: Still works ok...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this around Christmas 2013 and used it all winter. It worked perfectly and was the best thing to get through the brutal MN cold. Packed it away this summer and just recently (September 2014) had to pull it out for the chilly nights...unfortunately it seems to not be working as well. Last winter I only needed it to be on level 2-3 all night and now it has to be at least on 8 to get warm. It still works, it just doesn't work like it used it...and it's less than a year old.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy it. The heat emailed it is a little bit warmer than I expected from the other reviews. I can keep it on three for about an hour and then have to turn it off!
customer_reviews.author: tish rumsey

customer_reviews.title: Love..Love..Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased this, I saw mixed reviews but went with my gut. My biggest concern was that several reviewers said it was loud. I didn't have this problem at all. This product exceeded my expectations. My husband doesn't like to sleep away from his warm bed now. I also love that it has the dual control since I'm going through menopause and my husband freezes all of the time. I would definitely buy another one of these! It's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: BECK

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I put this on the mattress the day the package came to our house. It has worked perfectly. With the dual temperature control, we each can set the temperature for our own preference. While it the controller has 10 set points, we've found that the 1 or 2 setting is fine to do the job. It's the first time we have used an electric heater in our bed, after 25 years of marriage. This heating mattress pad has made an improvement in our lifes; no more multiple layers of blankets weighing us down.
customer_reviews.author: C. Younghans-Haug

customer_reviews.title: Does not get warm enough
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the king size which works great. I also purchased two full size. The full size are manufactured differently and don't get warm enough. I would try a different brand in full size.
customer_reviews.author: -JK

customer_reviews.title: I'd Buy It Again...
customer_reviews.text: Showed up super quick...Packaged up all nice and small. Slapped it on the mattress...Plugged it in and it heated right up. It definitely doesn't feel super warm to the touch but once you hop in under the sheets it is FANTASTIC! The controller boxes feel a little cheap but they do the job. I haven't heard any of the buzzing from the power boxes like I read in the reviews. I would definitely recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: REIGNSoner

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of a bed that's too warm, but not a fan of icy sheets when getting into bed either. Turning it on at high prior to going to bed, and once in bed I turn it off or on low. Absolutely unable to feel the wires in it (and believe me, I tried), and no hum from the adapters as described in the other listings.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have used heated mattress pads for years and our old one needed replaced. This one works great with dual controls. Fits our oversized mattress with no problem. Love that the cords plug in at head area. Great pad!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie K

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful even after a year
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mattress pad since 2014 and I still Love it. I turn on about 10 min before bed ours toasty warm when wet get in. No need to go higher then a 2 or 3 plenty warm at that level im buying another for a house warming gift for my son. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: NahNah

customer_reviews.title: What a luxury to get into a warm bed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge luxury. We use it to warm up the bed before getting in - a cold bed has always been a problem in our cold house. The pad does warm up nicely, you can certainly feel the heat when there has been a quilt over the bed while it's warming up. We turn it off as soon as we get in bed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: This pad works great and you cannot feel the heating wires so we ...
customer_reviews.text: This pad works great and you cannot feel the heating wires so we leave it on our bed year round. I ordered it to replace the one we have used for at least 10 years that finally stopped working on one side. This one is the same manufacturer and style and I hope it last as long as our first one.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H.

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that both sides stopped working about one and a ...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover works as expected: very cozy. I was disappointed that both sides stopped working about one and a half years after purchase, one side about 2 weeks after the other. I called customer service, since this product has a 5-year warranty and was pleased that they sent a replacement right away.
customer_reviews.author: cubicle 15

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this heating pad for 7 months as a replacement for a Sleep Number warming pad. As far as we can tell they are manufactured by the same company and this one is much less expensive. The sleep number pad lasted for 5 years before we wore it out with multiple washes. This warming pad performs every bit as well as the old one. In fact, the old one had discolored electrical wires from using the high heat setting. This pad does not have that issue. The transformers do not make any noise as other customers have mentioned. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs Z.

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!!!  Best heated mattress pad ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this from on top of my amazing new soft heat heated mattress pad...ahhhhhhh!!! It feels so wonderful to climb into my bed and feel this warmth! It's like being at a spa!! It not only warms me but relaxes my sore muscles. So therapeutic as well!! You will love this pad, excellent quality and you cannot feel the wires at all. I am in love!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Erica Heber

customer_reviews.title: You can't feel the wires!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad is awesome. Our previous one (a different brand) had large wires and could be uncomfortable. With this one you cannot feel them at all. Also the connections are at the head of the bed where you actually have outlets! And the connections are on the vertical surface of the mattress so that you don't fee those either.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy E

customer_reviews.title: it is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: it keeps my wife warm and happy, she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Billy Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this mattress pad. One of the controllers has already stopped working. unplugged, disconnected the wires to the bed, nothing. I would not recommend this product. Wish I had not wasted my money on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft heat
customer_reviews.text: This heated mattress pad is great. I bought it to replace a worn out electric blanket and to see if the DC heat from below was any better than a blanket. Don't know about the DC part, but the heat is great! I turn it on high when I get in (I work nights), and by the time I eat and check my email, the bed is toasty warm! Then I turn it down to low and sleep like a baby all day. Although it is a bit pricy, I would buy it again. They seemed to have fixed the noise problem - I have heard nothing from the transformers.
customer_reviews.author: W. Conner

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and Soothing
customer_reviews.text: Very mellow even warmth at low settings. It heats quickly as the settings increase. I can't feel the heating elements the way I have with other warmers. I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: J. E.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item - have waited a long time to review because this is probably the 4th one I have purchased and usually they stop working after a year or so... I am on year two with this item and it is still great! Fits my 22" mattress and heats up quickly. Worth every penny to get into a warmed bed on these cold winter nights!
customer_reviews.author: BerryChowTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Solved the cold bed problem!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Got the king so we have dual controls. Getting into a cold bed is a thing of the past. I turn it on high minutes before I go to bed and when I get in, I'm immediately warm and relaxed. I turn it off all night! Under a down quilt I'm warm enough. I don't hear any noise with this mattress cover and the dial is lighted too.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Soft heat source for your bed with constant low level heat
customer_reviews.text: Love the product; performs way better than expected; couple of extra bucks WELL WORTH it; tucks in neatly under mattress -- no bunching up; separate low voltage transformers for each side of the bed with individual control settings "Lo, 1 - 10" -- we start the heat at a 2 or 3 setting for 15 minutes, then go to bed and immediately down set the control at either Lo or 1 with total satisfaction of night-long, soothing warmth for old, painful bodies. But if you're a spring chicken living in the "ARCTIC VORTEX" of 2013-2014, alas, well you have our sympathies; yet you will LOVE going to bed. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Horst Maerzke

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: I had another brand before this no idea what and it worked great till I washed it...death. This one is just as good. I only use one side as I'm a divorced guy so I can't rate the non-use side. Ok, cute older ladies that's an opening. ;-) Works as advertised no issues at all. Crank it up 15 minutes before going into my 50 degree winter bedroom an dboy is it nice. The only problem is morning it is so tough to pull yourself out of that warm bed an dinto the cold bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: john cahalane

customer_reviews.title: working great so far
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived with only one of the two temperature dials required for king size beds. I contacted customer service through the product web site and received a call several days later. They promptly shipped the missing part and everything has worked great since then. The embedded wires are unobtrusive and I don't notice them while sleeping. The heat is gentle yet plenty warm with the dials never going above 2 or 3.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am always freezing but electric blankets just don't do it for me. I tried this mattress pad and it is excellent! I warm the bed on high and then turn it down to 1 or 2 and it keeps me comfortable all night. I've gotten an additional one for our guest room and recommended it to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Bed warmer was wonderful, but one side went out after about 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Bed warmer was wonderful, but one side went out after about 2 seasons. The other side went out after 3.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: We have several of these for different beds. Recommended to mom and friends as well. Everyone loves them. Even heat. Gentle if you will. Great that it's heated from below. Get in bed on a cold night and it's great. Seem to wash fine. One we've had for probably 18 months and it's still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: G. M. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Product Support Poor.
customer_reviews.text: Controller does not stay on after a few seconds and thus does not heat the pad. I sent email for product support and have heard nothing yet. Any one have an answer ?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This was my first heated mattress cover and it is GREAT! It is well made and heats evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me warm!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I live in SC it gets cold and I do not have heat in my bedroom. This heated mattress pad is awesome. It fit my twin bed perfectly. I cannot feel the wires. I do not hear any hum as other reviews stated. Of course I do have tinnitus so not sure if that counts. But I love this pad. I have not needed to wash it yet...but so far so good! It warms the bed up quickly (turn it on an hour before going to bed) and I turn it down to low when I go to bed. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Dual control so works for both of us. Has plenty of heat to spare. I typically sleep with it on 2 and it is plenty warm. The fitted parts pops off like fitted sheets tend to do, but I think that is more to do with our mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Easley

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working!!
customer_reviews.text: Used one night, already stopped working! The controller turns on/lights up when button pushed but then goes lights out right away.
customer_reviews.author: jill m. heibult

customer_reviews.title: I love that it has two zones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my perpetually cold wife to use at night. She loves it. I love that it has two zones, so I do not have to have the heat turned on for my side of the bed. We have had this for about a year and it has held up fine.
customer_reviews.author: jw3574

product_meta.title: SoftHeat | Smart Heated Electric Mattress Pad with Safe & Warm Low Voltage Technology, Dobby Stripe, King, White
product_meta.description: Size:King| Style Name:Dobby StripeWe’ve designed a safe and incredibly soft electric mattress pad that not only warms your bed, but also rejuvenates it. Due to the all over penetrating warmth of this low-voltage mattress pad, you’ll start saving money on your energy bill while lowering your thermostat. The 233 thread-count 80% poly/20% cotton dobby stripe shell is incredibly soft, soothing and supportive. Constructed within the pad is the patented Safe & Warm low-voltage technology. This low-voltage mattress pad includes a small power supply box that changes 120 volt AC home current into non-hazardous low voltage DC current (very similar to a battery) to provide warmth, protection and safety even if the pad becomes wet. Unlike other warming pads with their thick bulky wires, the heating wires in the Soft Heat pads are so small, they are virtually unnoticeable. During construction we place the ultra thin wires 3-inches apart and evenly distribute them from head to toe. The benefit to you is a pad that gives more of an even heat and has no annoying hot or cold spots. The king size pad is divided in two separate zones and comes standard with two easy to read, easy to turn, non-slip computerized controllers to adjust the temperature of each side of the bed giving individual comfort and control. For cozy sheets before bed time, it has an automatic pre-heat and hold feature. You simply turn it on and the pad will warm up on HI until it reaches the temperature that you pre set your dial on, and then adjusts itself to hold it there. For your safety convenience and power conservation, it has an automatic shut off feature that will shut the pad off after 10 hours just in case you forget. It also comes standard with built in over-temperature protection for that extra bit of safety and peace of mind. On the controller, a giant backlit display with auto dimming feature provides more convenience for night time adjustments with out having to turn on the lights. A fitted skirt keeps it all in place. Reverse Fabric - Laminate backing
